name: BIG CHICKEN
description:
BIG CHICKEN is a strategic Arcade Style Game where you slam your way through waves of Evil Garden Veggies. Can you make it through all 10 Stages?

Want to learn more about BIG CHICKEN? 

Check out these 2-Minute Devlogs!



Come Share Your Highscores in the Green Box Games Discord! ---------------------------------------------------------  About:

This is game #1 of my 12 Games in 12 Months Challenge I've set for myself in 2023. I Hope you guys enjoy.

Special thanks to Munkie Beets for the OST.

--------------------------------------------------------- Controls: 

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

SPACE to SUPER CHICKEN SLAM

Press E to select an Item

Press SPACE while an Item is selected to use it
